sen.e: Escaping Nobuyori intended to flee with Yoshitomo to the Eastern Provinces however, Yoshitomo had only harsh words "Japan's greatest loser" and refused.

sen.j: 仁和寺にいた後白河院にすがり助命を嘆願するが、朝廷は信頼を謀反の張本人として許さず、六条河原で斬首された。
sen.e: At Ninna-ji Temple where Cloistered Emperor Goshirakawa had gone, he pleaded for clemency but, the Imperial Court did not pardon Nobuyori as ringleader of insurrection and he was beheaded at the Rokujo-gawara execution grounds.
